summary:
This mods improves Telekinesis in the following aspects:
-More damage dealt by throwing objects.
-Faster lifting.
-Faster throwing.
-Spell works at larger distances.
descriptionHtml:
The Elder Scrolls V SKYRIM:

==================
Improved Telekinesis
==================

By SpaceOne

1. Description & Changelog
2. Requirements
3. Installing the plug-in
4. Conflicts/Known Errors
5. Usage

============================
1. DESCRIPTION & CHANGELOG
============================

Changelog:

v1.1 - Added a less damage version and reuploaded main file due to small dirty edit.

Description:

This mods improves Telekinesis in the following aspects:
-More damage dealt by throwing objects.
-Faster lifting.
-Faster throwing.
-Spell works at larger distances.

Now you can kill people by throwing cabbage at them!!!

===============
2. REQUIREMENTS:
===============

-TheElder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

-Not a requirement, but this mod is much better with JustinOther\'s More Interactive Items: 
  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3562

========================
3. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN
========================

Put the .esp file in your /Data folder and activate it in the launcher.

============================
4. CONFLICTS / KNOWN ERRORS
============================
Only modifies game settings.
Doesn\'t modify any SPELL or MGEF forms so it should be safe to use along most magic overhauls, in any case a few modifications to load order can solve the conflict.

============================
5. USAGE
============================

You can use this mod in any way you see fit, no need to give credit or ask for permission.
author: SpaceOne
